additional_info:
This is what my style will change:

- Sitewide font: Droid Sans (download at https://www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Droid+Sans)
- Frontpage posts font: Roboto (download at https://www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Roboto)
- Better spacing for frontpage posts
- Removed: "give gold" links, sidebar from frontpage and /r/dashboard, multireddit toggler and post ranks
- Better looking thumbnails and subreddit names
- Better looking RES items (neverending reddit, images in the viewer, gallery captions, etc)
- Better looking forms

As you can see in the images, my style is 100% friendly with dark themes and subreddits with heavily modded stylesheets

MAR 6, 2016
- Downvote arrows will now appear in every sub, whether you're subscribed or not

MAY 11, 2015
- Added styles for users with compressed link display
